#  Types

You can import all types at once:

```python
from trueconf.types import *
```

::: trueconf.types.AddedChatParticipant
    options:
        filters:
            - "!^_"
            - "!^__"
            - "!bot"
            - "!bind"

::: trueconf.types.ChangedParticipantRole
    options:
        filters:
            - "!^_"
            - "!^__"
            - "!bot"
            - "!bind"
